    • Uses of Logger in com.sun.enterprise.web.logger

      Classes in com.sun.enterprise.web.logger that implement Logger 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CatalinaLogger
      This is an adapter of java.util.logging.Logger to org.apache.catalina.Logger.
      class  IASLogger
      An implementation of Logger that writes log messages using JDK 1.4's logging API.

    • Uses of Logger in org.apache.catalina.logger

      Classes in org.apache.catalina.logger that implement Logger 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileLogger
      Implementation of Logger that appends log messages to a file named {prefix}.{date}.{suffix} in a configured directory, with an optional preceding timestamp.
      class  LoggerBase
      Convenience base class for Logger implementations.
      class  SystemErrLogger
      Simple implementation of Logger that writes to System.err.
      class  SystemOutLogger
      Simple implementation of Logger that writes to System.out.
